MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH6 and EH7 postcode areas of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.35PM. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45AM.  Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.46PM on 26th January 2021.
